alvarionMaintenanceMIB.name: alvarionMaintenanceMIB
alvarionMaintenanceMIB.contactinfo: Alvarion Ltd. Postal: 21a HaBarzel St. P.O. Box 13139 Tel-Aviv 69710 Israel Phone: +972 3 645 6262

firmwarePeriodicUpdate.name: firmwarePeriodicUpdate
firmwarePeriodicUpdate.description: Specifies if firmware updates are automatically triggered on a periodic basis or not. 'true': Automatically update the firmware based on the information specified in the firmwareUpdateDay and firmwareUpdateTime attributes. 'false': No firmware update is triggered unless a request is specifically issude using the firmwareUpdateInitiate attribute.

firmwareUpdateDay.name: firmwareUpdateDay
firmwareUpdateDay.description: When firmwarePeriodicUpdate is set to true, this attribute specifies the day that automatic updates will occur.

firmwareUpdateTime.name: firmwareUpdateTime
firmwareUpdateTime.description: When firmwarePeriodicUpdate is set to true, this attribute specifies the time of the day for an automatic firmware update. Specify the time in hours (00-23) and minutes (00-59) in the format HH:MM. The ':' character is mandatory between the fields.

firmwareUpdateLocation.name: firmwareUpdateLocation
firmwareUpdateLocation.description: Specifies the URL where the new firmware file is located. This is used when the firmware update is triggered manually or automatically on a periodic basis.

firmwareUpdateInitiate.name: firmwareUpdateInitiate
firmwareUpdateInitiate.description: Triggers a firmware update using the firmware specified in the firmwareUpdateLocation attribute. Reading this attribute always returns 'idle'.

firmwareUpdateNotificationEnabled.name: firmwareUpdateNotificationEnabled
firmwareUpdateNotificationEnabled.description: Specifies if firmwareUpdateNotification notifications are generated.

firmwareUpdateInfo.name: firmwareUpdateInfo
firmwareUpdateInfo.description: Contains various information about the firmware update and is used with firmware update notifications to provide more detailed information.

configurationPeriodicUpdate.name: configurationPeriodicUpdate
configurationPeriodicUpdate.description: Specifies if configuration file updates are automatically triggered on a periodic basis or not. 'true': Automatically update the configuration file based on the information specified in the configurationUpdateDay and configurationUpdateTime attributes. 'false': No configuration file update is triggered unless a request is specifically issude using the configurationUpdateInitiate attribute.

configurationUpdateDay.name: configurationUpdateDay
configurationUpdateDay.description: When configurationPeriodicUpdate is set to true, this attribute specifies the day that automatic updates will occur.

configurationUpdateTime.name: configurationUpdateTime
configurationUpdateTime.description: When configurationPeriodicUpdateis set to true, this attribute specifies the time of the day for an automatic configuration file update. Specify the time in hours (00-23) and minutes (00-59) in the format HH:MM. The ':' character is mandatory between the fields.

configurationUpdateLocation.name: configurationUpdateLocation
configurationUpdateLocation.description: Specifies the URL where the new configuration file is located. This is used when the update is triggered manually or automatically on a periodic basis.

configurationUpdateInitiate.name: configurationUpdateInitiate
configurationUpdateInitiate.description: Triggers a configuration file update using the configuration file specified in the configurationUpdateLocation attribute. Reading this attribute always returns 'idle'.

configurationUpdateOperation.name: configurationUpdateOperation
configurationUpdateOperation.description: Specifies the operation that is performed on the configuration file. 'backup': Saves the current device configuration into the file specified in the configurationUpdateLocation attribute. 'restore': Loads the file specified in the configurationUpdateLocation attribute into the device.

configurationUpdateNotificationEnabled.name: configurationUpdateNotificationEnabled
configurationUpdateNotificationEnabled.description: Specifies if configurationUpdateNotification notifications are generated.

configurationLocalUpdateNotificationEnab.name: configurationLocalUpdateNotificationEnabled
configurationLocalUpdateNotificationEnab.description: Specifies if configurationLocalUpdateNotification notifications are generated.

configurationUpdateInfo.name: configurationUpdateInfo
configurationUpdateInfo.description: Contains various information about the configuration update and is used with configuration update notifications to provide more detailed information.

configurationFactoryDefaults.name: configurationFactoryDefaults
configurationFactoryDefaults.description: Resets the device configuration to Factory Default. Important: This will reset the community names and shut down all connections. Reading this object will always return 'idle'.

configurationRestart.name: configurationRestart
configurationRestart.description: Restarts the device. Important: This will shut down all connections. Reading this object will always return 'idle'.

certificateAboutToExpireNotificationEnab.name: certificateAboutToExpireNotificationEnabled
certificateAboutToExpireNotificationEnab.description: Specifies if certificateAboutToExpireNotification notifications are generated.

certificateExpiredNotificationEnabled.name: certificateExpiredNotificationEnabled
certificateExpiredNotificationEnabled.description: Specifies if certificateExpiredNotification notifications are generated.

certificateExpiryDate.name: certificateExpiryDate
certificateExpiryDate.description: Indicates the current expiry date of the certificate.

firmwareUpdateNotification.name: firmwareUpdateNotification
firmwareUpdateNotification.description: Sent when a firmware update was attempted from a remote server.

configurationUpdateNotification.name: configurationUpdateNotification
configurationUpdateNotification.description: Sent when a configuration update was attempted from a remote server.

certificateAboutToExpireNotification.name: certificateAboutToExpireNotification
certificateAboutToExpireNotification.description: Sent when a certificate is about to expire.

certificateExpiredNotification.name: certificateExpiredNotification
certificateExpiredNotification.description: Sent when a certificate has expired.

alvarionMaintenanceMIBCompliance.name: alvarionMaintenanceMIBCompliance
alvarionMaintenanceMIBCompliance.description: The compliance statement for entities which implement the Alvarion Maintenance MIB.

alvarionMaintenanceMIBGroup.name: alvarionMaintenanceMIBGroup
alvarionMaintenanceMIBGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the Maintenance MIB capability.
